title: Bachelor degree Computer Science
additional: I am Majoring in Computer Science at the University of Antwerp

title: Honours Programme Science
additional: Currently participating in the Honours Programme Science, which is a special program for students (who are doing a bachelor's degree that is part of the science department). This program covers present-day topics of all types of sciences that are part of the science department. As part of this program I get lectures from professors (of various fields) about the topics they are currently researching about. I also followed research groups of our university (my case IDLab: one of the biggest research groups in Belgium for computer science and TQC: Theory of quantum systems and complex systems).

title: Study Abroad: Topics in Computer Science: Web Application Development (CS 391)
additional: During the summer of 2024, I took a course at Boston University. In this course I learned more about web development

title: Master degree Computer Science: Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
additional: I am currently participating in the master degree Computer Science: Data Science and Artificial Intelligence at the University of Antwerp.
